attributes.action: Gordon Brown to actually answer a question at PMQs or from the media
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since Gordon Brow became PM he has never answered a question at PMQs or to the media, instead he rambles on about other issues or issues he 'thinks' people want to hear. It's time GB started to answer the questions put to him in a straight and honest way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
